about_the_game:
*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content. If necessary, please install the latest software patch(es).

●Description
Perfect Gem Set
The Perfect Gem Set contains 333 in-game items, including artifacts required for the new job type, Machina, and a total of 25 kinds of gems (each gem type, as well as other jewels used as currency).

The following items are included:

　Divine Weapon Gem x5
　Gold Gem x5 / Silver Gem x10 / Copper Gem x15
　Incremental Gem x10 / Intensification Gem x5 / Enhancement Gem x10
＜Weapon and Equipment Gems>
　Unnamed Gem ×20
　Sword Gem ×20 / Katana Gem ×20 / Heavy Weapon Gem ×20
　Long Staff Gem ×20
　Special Gem ×20 / Staff Gem ×20 / Bow Gem ×20
　Shield Gem x15 / Hat Gem x15 / Helmet Gem x15
　Light Armor Gem ×15 / Heavy Armor Gem ×15 / Inner Gem ×15
　Accessory Gem x15
＜Currency Jewels>
　Large Gem ×1
　Small Gem x2
　Gemstone x5

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.

*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content. If necessary, please install the latest software patch(es).

●Description
Perfect Gem Set
The Perfect Gem Set contains 333 in-game items, including artifacts required for the new job type, Machina, and a total of 25 kinds of gems (each gem type, as well as other jewels used as currency).

The following items are included:

　Divine Weapon Gem x5
　Gold Gem x5 / Silver Gem x10 / Copper Gem x15
　Incremental Gem x10 / Intensification Gem x5 / Enhancement Gem x10
＜Weapon and Equipment Gems>
　Unnamed Gem ×20
　Sword Gem ×20 / Katana Gem ×20 / Heavy Weapon Gem ×20
　Long Staff Gem ×20
　Special Gem ×20 / Staff Gem ×20 / Bow Gem ×20
　Shield Gem x15 / Hat Gem x15 / Helmet Gem x15

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.

name: DEMON GAZE EXTRA - Tons of Fun! Perfect Gem Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-2510E 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: The Perfect Gem Set contains 333 in-game items, including artifacts required for the new job type, Machina, and a total of 25 kinds of gems (each gem type, as well as other jewels used as currency).
supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
